meanings.sent1: She singularizes her artwork by adding personal touches.
meanings.sent2: The artist singularizes each painting with a signature style.
meanings.sent3: His habit of wearing mismatched socks singularizes him in a fun way.
meanings.sent4: The rare flower singularizes the garden with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The way she plays the piano singularizes her musical talent.

meanings.definition: To distinguish or set apart as unique
meanings.sent1: The special symbol singularizes the ancient manuscript.
meanings.sent2: His exceptional skills singularizes him from the rest of the team.
meanings.sent3: The quirky hat singularizes him in a humorous way.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter singularizes her presence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The old watch singularizes his collection of vintage items.
